medium: Color screenprint, lithograph, and gold radiance powder
title: Angel and Boy
marks: Numbered, chop mark LL: [trial proof first version (uncorrected)]
description: Two nude figures; a boy on L next to a celestial figure with wings and a halo on R; the boy is crouched over; his body illuminated by a haze of bright color; predominant colors: green, blue, peach and gold
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of Mr. and Mrs. George McKay Reid
